{"id":1811743485,"question_id":4078,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 weeks, 2 days","timestamp":1761446157,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"160 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1811743485/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximum Alternating Sum of Squares","memory":"178.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    long long maxAlternatingSum(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int N = (int)nums.size();\n        for (int i=0; i<N; i++)\n            nums[i] = nums[i] * nums[i];\n        sort(nums.rbegin(), nums.rend());\n\n        long long ans = 0;\n        for (int i=0; i<N; i++) {\n            if (i < ceil(N*1.0/2))\n                ans += nums[i];\n            else \n                ans -= nums[i];\n        }\n\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximum-alternating-sum-of-squares","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":1288}
